choices:
To qualify for this study, you must have expertise in medical communication. You might disqualify if you do not show expertise. Please answer the qustions below to continue.

This is a pilot study. If you qualify, you will be invited to participate in subsequent studies!

text: How many years of experience do you have studying medicine / related fields?
How many years of experience do you have practicing medicine / related roles?
What kind of training did you have in the field of medicine?
